com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Enum BleScanMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<BleScanMode>
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleScanMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<BleScanMode>
    Deprecated. 
    This is deprecated in favor of BleScanApi.

    @Deprecated
public enum BleScanMode
extends Enum<BleScanMode>
    Type-safe parallel of various static final int members of ScanSettings and a way to force pre-Lollipop scanning mode. Provide an option to BleManagerConfig.scanMode.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      AUTO
      Deprecated. 
      This option is recommended and will let SweetBlue automatically choose what scanning mode to use based on whether the app is backgrounded, if we're doing a long-term scan, polling scan, etc.
      CLASSIC
      Deprecated. 
      Will force SweetBlue to use BluetoothAdapter.startDiscovery(), which is so-called "Bluetooth Classic" discovery.
      HIGH_POWER
      Deprecated. 
      - This will be removed in v3. Use BleScanPower.HIGH_POWER instead.
      LOW_POWER
      Deprecated. 
      - This will be removed in v3. Use BleScanPower.LOW_POWER instead.
      MEDIUM_POWER
      Deprecated. 
      - This will be removed in v3. Use BleScanPower.MEDIUM_POWER instead.
      POST_LOLLIPOP
      Deprecated. 
      This will tell SweetBlue to use the newer scanning API introduced in Lollipop (BluetoothLeScanner.startScan(List, ScanSettings, ScanCallback)) .
      PRE_LOLLIPOP
      Deprecated. 
      This forces the use of the pre-Lollipop scanning API BluetoothAdapter.startLeScan(BluetoothAdapter.LeScanCallback), which was deprecated in Lollipop.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • AUTO

        public static final BleScanMode AUTO
        Deprecated. 
        This option is recommended and will let SweetBlue automatically choose what scanning mode to use based on whether the app is backgrounded, if we're doing a long-term scan, polling scan, etc.

      • CLASSIC

        public static final BleScanMode CLASSIC
        Deprecated. 
        Will force SweetBlue to use BluetoothAdapter.startDiscovery(), which is so-called "Bluetooth Classic" discovery. This is the scanning mode used on the Android Bluetooth Settings screen. It only returns the mac address and name of your device through a BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.ScanEvent, as opposed to full LE scanning packets which usually have a service UUID (at the least) as well.

      • PRE_LOLLIPOP

        public static final BleScanMode PRE_LOLLIPOP
        Deprecated. 
        This forces the use of the pre-Lollipop scanning API BluetoothAdapter.startLeScan(BluetoothAdapter.LeScanCallback), which was deprecated in Lollipop.

      • POST_LOLLIPOP

        public static final BleScanMode POST_LOLLIPOP
        Deprecated. 
        This will tell SweetBlue to use the newer scanning API introduced in Lollipop (BluetoothLeScanner.startScan(List, ScanSettings, ScanCallback)) . We've found that this API is not yet as good as it's predecessor. It may be better for battery life, as you have more control over the scanning power (using BleScanPower), however, even at BleScanPower.HIGH_POWER, we've found that it doesn't discover devices as reliably as the pre-lollipop scan API.

      • LOW_POWER

        @Deprecated
public static final BleScanMode LOW_POWER
        Deprecated. - This will be removed in v3. Use BleScanPower.LOW_POWER instead.
        Lollipop-and-up-relevant-only, this is strict typing for ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_LOW_POWER. For phones lower than Lollipop, PRE_LOLLIPOP will automatically be used instead.

      • MEDIUM_POWER

        @Deprecated
public static final BleScanMode MEDIUM_POWER
        Deprecated. - This will be removed in v3. Use BleScanPower.MEDIUM_POWER instead.
        Lollipop-and-up-relevant-only, this is strict typing for ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_BALANCED. For phones lower than Lollipop, PRE_LOLLIPOP will automatically be used instead.

      • HIGH_POWER

        @Deprecated
public static final BleScanMode HIGH_POWER
        Deprecated. - This will be removed in v3. Use BleScanPower.HIGH_POWER instead.
        Lollipop-and-up-relevant-only, this is strict typing for ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_LOW_LATENCY. For phones lower than Lollipop, PRE_LOLLIPOP will automatically be used instead.
